translation.welcome: Welcome to React, tailwindcss and more

home.heroDesc: A modern, blazing-fast React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS starter with i18n, TurboRepo, and more. Build beautiful apps, faster.
home.modalDemoMessage: Are you ready to get started?

typescript.title: TypeScript Ready
typescript.desc: Full TypeScript support for safety and productivity.

husky.title: Husky & lint-staged
husky.desc: Pre-commit hooks for linting and formatting your code.

turbo.title: Turbo Fast
turbo.desc: Optimized for speed with TurboRepo and Vite.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.desc: Beautiful, utility-first styling out of the box.

i18n.title: i18n Support
i18n.desc: Ready for multiple languages and locales.
